methods.name: play
methods.content: Plays a 1D array of `Scene` objects, generating an animation and presenting it in Java Lab. There can be only one call to `play()`  or `playScenes()` per execution of a program.

methods.name: playScenes
methods.content: Plays the `Scene` object provided, generating an animation and displaying it in Java Lab. There can be only one call to `play()`  or `playScenes()` per execution of a program.

methods.name: playScenes
methods.content: Plays all `Scene` objects provided as parameters to this call. This method uses a special feature of Java that allows for any number of `Scene` objects to be passed to the method without requiring an array to be created. There can be only one call to `play()`  or `playScenes()` per execution of a program.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"scenes","type":"Scene","required":true,"description":"one or more `Scene` objects to be played for the animation"}]
